name: AfterZoom
synopsis: Immerse yourself into a world of hidden creatures! AfterZoom turns the camera of your Nintendo DSi or your Nintendo 3DS systems into a microscope. Explore your surroundings and discover new forms of life. Collect dozens of different species and take good care of them at the Specimens Bank. Mix the formulas you'll need to feed your organisms at the Chemical Lab. Battle your colonies against more powerful ones to win them over and complete your collection.
